00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <hdf.h>
00020 
00037 MTKt_status MtkFileCoreMetaDataRaw(
00038   const char *filename,    
00039   char **coremeta           )
00040 {
00041   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00042   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00043   intn hdf_status;
00044   int32 sds_id = FAIL;
00045 
00046   if (filename == NULL)
00047     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00048 
00049   /* Open HDF File */
00050   hdf_status = sds_id = SDstart(filename, DFACC_READ);
00051   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDSTART_FAILED);
00053 
00054   /* Read coremetadata. */
00055   status = MtkFileCoreMetaDataRawFid(sds_id, coremeta);
00056   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00057 
00058   /* Close HDF File */
00059   hdf_status = SDend(sds_id);
00060   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00061     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDEND_FAILED);
00062   sds_id = FAIL;
00063 
00064   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00065 
00066 ERROR_HANDLE:
00067   if (sds_id != FAIL)
00068     SDend(sds_id);
00069 
00070   return status_code;
00071 }
00072 
00078 MTKt_status MtkFileCoreMetaDataRawFid(
00079   int32 sds_id,            
00080   char **coremeta           )
00081 {
00082   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00083   intn hdf_status;
00084   int32 attr_index;
00085   char attr_name[80];
00086   int32 data_type;
00087   int32 count;
00088   char *attr_buf = NULL;
00089 
00090   if (coremeta == NULL)
00091     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00092 
00093   /* Find attribute index */
00094   hdf_status = attr_index = SDfindattr(sds_id, "coremetadata");
00095   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00096     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDFINDATTR_FAILED);
00097 
00098   /* Get attribute information */
00099   hdf_status = SDattrinfo(sds_id, attr_index, attr_name, &data_type, &count);
00100   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00101     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDATTRINFO_FAILED);
00102 
00103   /* Allocate Memory */
00104   attr_buf = (char*)malloc((count + 1) * sizeof(char));
00105   if (attr_buf == NULL)
00106     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00107 
00108   /* Read attribute */
00109   hdf_status = SDreadattr(sds_id, attr_index, (VOIDP)attr_buf);
00110   if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00111     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDREADATTR_FAILED);
00112 
00113   attr_buf[count] = '\0';
00114 
00115   *coremeta = attr_buf;
00116 
00117   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00118 
00119 ERROR_HANDLE:
00120   if (attr_buf != NULL)
00121     free(attr_buf);
00122 
00123   return status_code;
00124 }
